content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2022 Preakness Stakes Packages

Allow us to design a 2022 Preakness Stakes travel package that is custom-crafted for you including your preferred tickets, first-class accommodations in Baltimore and more. Join us at “Old Hilltop” for the second jewel in racing’s prestigious Triple Crown. This year will mark the 147th Preakness Stakes; for over a century Pimlico has served as host to some of the biggest racing legends in the world. Preakness is a highlight of every racing season and 2022 should be no exception. Year after year, Baltimore welcomes the sport’s top thoroughbreds for this thrilling event. Whether this is your first Preakness or your 40th, this year promises to be as memorable as ever!

Complete 2022 Preakness Stakes packages available from $875 per person (based on double occupancy).
